duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive excellent results in customer service and operational efficiency in our mobile service teams.
Develop and implement appropriate standards and processes to continuously elevate the overall service experience.
Champion open communication, active problem solving, and a positive work environment within the team.
Understand every aspect of the team's performance, increase efficiency, and drive continuous improvement in all aspects of operations.
Ensure excellence in the center’s daily operations to achieve specific goals in productivity, quality, output, cost, as well as revenue/margin.
Develop a knowledge of all Tesla products, as well as Service systems, processes, and procedures.
Be an advocate for customers and the team, ensuring their success.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent professional experience. Prior leadership experience in a service-focused industry. Automotive expertise is not required. Experience leading teams and managing a diverse group of roles and responsibilities.
